definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: His nephew is an uncouth young man.
sentences.chinese: 他的侄子是一个粗野的年轻人。

sentences.english: My teenaged nephew's face is covered with zits.
sentences.chinese: 我那正值青春期的侄子脸上长满青春痘。

sentences.english: Hearing we will go out to play, my little niece jumped and leapt out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 去玩，我的小侄子连蹦带跳地跑出了家门。

sentences.english: Worked out with my nephew, doing full-body weight exercises
sentences.chinese: 与我的侄子一起锻炼身体。

sentences.english: Her nephew, Jesse's father, worked in an adjoining field.
sentences.chinese: 她的侄子，杰希的父亲，在相邻的土地上耕作。

sentences.english: his nephew and son-in-law Yahia Saleh, who heads the security forces.
sentences.chinese: 他的侄子和女婿是安全部队的领导。

sentences.english: One day when he went out, his niece sell the ill cattle.
sentences.chinese: 一天他外出，他的侄子将牛牵到集市上卖了。

sentences.english: He gave his foolish nephew some seasonable advice.
sentences.chinese: 他给他那些愚笨的侄子一些及时的劝告。

sentences.english: Just returned from a 5 day trip with daughter, mum-in-law and niece…
sentences.chinese: 和女儿，婆婆和侄子一起旅行了五天，刚返回。

sentences.english: You are an ungrateful nephew and you will not get anything…
sentences.chinese: 你是一个不知好歹的侄子，你什么也别想得到。

sentences.english: Last year, my uncle almost got into a fistfight with my nephew.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我叔叔还差点和我侄子因为这个要打起来。

sentences.english: Benvolio, nephew to Montague, and friend to Romeo.
sentences.chinese: 班弗里奥，蒙太古的侄子及罗密欧的朋友。

sentences.english: They had some distinguished guests - Thu’s parents and her nephew.
sentences.chinese: 他们有些贵客，阿彤的父母和侄子也来了。

sentences.english: I remember the first time I was taught this principal, and it was from my 8 yr. old nephew.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得第一次教我这个道理的是我八岁的小侄子。

sentences.english: He decided to deed the ownreship of houses over to his youngest son.
sentences.chinese: 那寡妇决定在去世前把房子立契转让给她侄子。

definition: younger male cousin via female line

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
daughter's son/grandson/descendant via the female line
